### PCR specifications

**Target Region and Size**: V4 region (\~292 bp)

**Template Concentration**: 30 ng/μL

**Enzyme and Master mix**: TaKaRa LA Taq (Cat. No. RR002A)

### **Primers**

| ID | Primer sequence | Length |
|----|----|----|
| V4_515F | <font color="red">TCGTCGGCAGCGTCAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAG</font>GTGYCAGCMGCCGCGGTAA | 52 |
| V4_806R | <font color="blue">GTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAG</font>GGACTACNVGGGTWTCTAAT | 54 |

### **PCR Mixture**

| Reagents            | Concentration | 1 reaction (25 μL) |
|---------------------|---------------|--------------------|
| DNA Template        | 30 ng         | 1 μL               |
| 10X LA PCR Buffer   | 1X            | 2.5 μL             |
| MgCl2               | 2.5 mM        | 2.5 μL             |
| dNTPs               | 0.1 mM        | 1 μL               |
| Forward Primer      | 0.4 pmol      | 1 μL               |
| Reverse Primer      | 0.4 pmol      | 1 μL               |
| Nuclease Free Water | \-            | 15.9 μL            |
| Takara LA Taq       | 0.5 U         | 0.1 μL             |
| Total               | \-            | 25 μL              |

### **PCR Conditions**

| Step | Temperature           | Time                     | Cycle |
|------|-----------------------|--------------------------|-------|
| 1    | 95 °C                 | 3 minutes                | 1     |
| 2    | 95 °C → 55 °C → 72 °C | 30 sec → 30 sec → 30 sec | 25    |
| 3    | 72 °C                 | 5 minutes                | 1     |
| 4    | 20 °C                 | ∞                        | \-    |
